action_title: Insulate power pylons to prevent electrocution
key_messages:
Key Messages:
A single before-and-after study in the USA found the insulating power pylons significantly reduced the number of Harrisâ€™s hawks Parabuteo unicinctus electrocuted.
background_information:
Background information and definitions:
Another method of preventing electrocution is to insulate parts of pylons that large birds are likely to touch at the same time.
